Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is an excellent opportunity to experience the quality and features of our product at a discounted rate. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
